standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: DM.RFENDTC is empty, but --ENRF is completed.

rules.description: Raise an error when DM.RFENDTC is empty and --ENRF is not empty.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --OCCUR should only be provided when --PRESP is equal to "Y".

rules.description: Raise an error when --PRESP is not equals to "Y" and --OCCUR is present in dataset or --STAT is equal to "NOT DONE" and --OCCUR is not blank

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: If AESER = "N" then none of the seriousness criteria (AESCAN, AESCONG, AESDISAB, AESDTH, AESHOSP, AESLIFE, AESOD, AESMIE) could be equal to "Y".

rules.description: Select record where AESCAN and AESCONG and AESDISAB and AESDTH and AESHOSP and AESLIFE and AESOD and AESMIE ^= "Y" However, AESER ^= "N"

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: CODTC is populated when IDVAR is also populated

rules.description: Trigger error when IDVAR is not null and CODTC is not null

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --STRESC should not be blank when either --ORRES is provided or --DRVFL = 'Y' .

rules.description: Raise an error when the value for --STRESC is null.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: SPECIES is present.

rules.description: Raise an error when SPECIES is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --LAT is present when --LOC is not present.

rules.description: Raise an error when --LOC is not present and --LAT is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: RSUBJID must equal DM.USUBJID when RSUBJID is populated and RSUBJID does not equal POOLID

rules.description: Verify that RSUBJID=DM.USUBJID when RSUBJID is populated and RSUBJID is not equal to POOLID

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --NOMLBL is present.

rules.description: Raise an error when --NOMLBL is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: IDVARVAL and USUBJID are not completed, but IDVAR equals Sequence Number.

rules.description: Raise an error when IDVARVAL and USUBJID are empty and IDVAR = Sequence Number.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --BODSYS is not empty and --BDSYCD is empty

rules.description: Raise an error if --BODSYS is not empty, --BDSYCD is empty

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: SBSTRAIN is present.

rules.description: Raise an error when SBSTRAIN is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: ARM is populated, when ARMCD is NULL

rules.description: Raise an error when ARM is not empty, but ARMCD is empty

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --TOXGR should not be null when --TOX is populated.

rules.description: Raise an error when --TOX is not empty, but --TOXGR is empty.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: Length of ACTARMCD is greater than 20 characters

rules.description: Trigger error if length of ACTARMCD is greater than 20 characters

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --STAT should be "NOT DONE" when --REASND is provided.

rules.description: Raise an error when --REASND is provided and --STAT is not equal to "NOT DONE".

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: Missing value for --DOSU, when --DOSE, --DOSTXT or --DOSTOT is provided

rules.description: Raise an error when --DOSU = null and (--DOSE ^= null or --DOSTOT ^= null or --DOSTXT ^= null)

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --RSTMOD is present.

rules.description: Raise an error when --RSTMOD is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --STRF is populated when --OCCUR = "N"

rules.description: When --OCCUR = 'N', --STRF must not be populated

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: TEDUR cannot be null when TEENRL is null

rules.description: Raise an error if TEDUR is null when TEENRL is null

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: VISITNUM for planned visit is not in TV.

rules.description: Raise an error when SVPRESP="Y" and VISITNUM is not in TV.VISITNUM

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --SCAT is equal to --CAT

rules.description: Trigger error when --SCAT is not null and --SCAT is equal to --CAT

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: There is not a one-to-one relationship between TSVAL and TSVALCD

rules.description: When TSVAL and TSVALCD are populated, there must be a one-to-one relationship between TSVALCD and TSVAL

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: RSUBJID when populated cannot equal USUBJID

rules.description: Verify that when RSUBJID populated , RSUBJID does not equal USUBJID

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: VISITNUM for unplanned visit is present in TV.

rules.description: Raise an error when SVPRESP is null and VISITNUM is present in TV.VISITNUM

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --RPENDY is present.

rules.description: Raise an error when --RPENDY is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: For a planned visit (SVPRESP = 'Y'), non-missing VISIT value must be among those present in TV.VISIT.

rules.description: Verify when VISIT is not null in any given domain and VISIT is planned (SVPRESP = 'Y'), then VISIT should be among TV.VISIT.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: VISITDY is populated when SVPRESP is null.  VISITDY is the Planned Study Day of a visit. It should not be populated for unplanned visits.

rules.description: Raise an error when SVPRESP is null and VISITDY is not null.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: DVSTDTC is earlier than RFICDTC in DM.

rules.description: Raise an error when DVSTDTC is earlier than RFICDTC in DM.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: SJ dataset is present.

rules.description: Raise an error when SJ dataset is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --NOMDY is present.

rules.description: Raise an error when --NOMDY is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --DETECT must never be used in SDTM-based human trials

rules.description: Raise an error when --DETECT is present in dataset.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: Value of --LOBXFL must be 'Y' or null

rules.description: Raise an error when --LOBXFL is not 'Y' or null

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: TSVALNF is populated when TSVAL is populated with a value that is not in the ISO 21090 null flavor codelist.

rules.description: When TSVAL is not populated with values or synonyms of values in the ISO 21090 null flavor codelist (or other terms that can be represented as null flavors), unless the term is included in published terminology, TSVALNF should be null.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --RFTDTC is populated when --TPTREF is null

rules.description: Trigger error when --TPTREF = null and --RFTDTC is populated

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: TSVALNF is null when TSVAL is null.

rules.description: Trigger error when TSVAL is null and TSVALNF is null

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: AGE is missing when AGEU is provided.

rules.description: Raise an error when AGEU is not blank and AGE is blank.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --TRT is equal to 'OTHER'

rules.description: Raise an error when --TRT = 'OTHER'

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --CAT is equal to --DECOD.

rules.description: Raise an error when --CAT = --DECOD.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: ETCD is not 'UNPLAN', when SEUPDES is not empty

rules.description: Raise an error when SEUPDES ^= null, ETCD ^= 'UNPLAN'

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --USCHFL is present.

rules.description: Raise an error when --USCHFL is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --CAT is equal to --BODSYS.

rules.description: Raise an error when --CAT = --BODSYS.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: IECAT equals "INCLUSION" and IEORRES is not equal to "N".

rules.description: Raise an error when IECAT="INCLUSION" and IEORRES^="N".

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: RPPLSTDY is present.

rules.description: Raise an error when RPPLSTDY is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: ECDOSE is empty, ECOCCUR is not equal to 'N' and ECSTAT is empty, but ECDOSTXT is also empty.

rules.description: Raise an error when ECDOSE is empty, ECOCCUR is not equal to 'N', ECSTAT is empty and ECDOSTXT is empty

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --IMPLBL is present.

rules.description: Raise an error when --IMPLBL is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: ETCD is not equal to 'UNPLAN' and not equal to TE.ETCD

rules.description: Raise an error when ETCD is not equal to 'UNPLAN' and not equal to TE.ETCD

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: EXTRT is PLACEBO, but EXDOSE is not equal to 0.

rules.description: When EXTRT is PLACEBO, EXDOSE must equal 0

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --DTHREL must never be used in SDTM-based data for human clinical trials

rules.description: Verifying presence of SEND variable --DTHREL

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: SSSTRESC = 'DEAD', but SSDTC < DM.DTHDTC.

rules.description: Raise an error when SSSTRESC = 'DEAD' and SSDTC < DM.DTHDTC.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --IMPLBL is present.

rules.description: Raise an error when --IMPLBL is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: AGEU is missing when AGE is provided.

rules.description: Raise an error when AGE is not blank and AGEU is blank.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: ELEMENT variable has a non-null value when ETCD has a value of 'UNPLAN'

rules.description: Verify that ELEMENT value is blank when ETCD is equal to UNPLAN

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: VISIT and VISITNUM do not have a one-to-one relationship

rules.description: Trigger error when VISITNUM is present in TV.VISITNUM and does not have a one-to-one relationship with VISIT

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --TPT is not present when --TPTNUM is present in a dataset

rules.description: Raise an error when --TPT is not present but --TPTNUM is present in dataset.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: Value for --VAMT is populated, when --TRTV is NULL.

rules.description: Raise an error when --TRTV is empty, --VAMT is not empty

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: TAETORD is not unique within ARM

rules.description: Trigger error when TAETORD is not unique within an ARM

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: Value for --STAT is populated, when --ORRES is populated

rules.description: Raise an error when both --ORRES and --STAT values are populated

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --TPTREF must be present when --ELTM is present in a dataset

rules.description: Raise an error when--ELTM is present but --TPTREF is not present in dataset.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: SSSTRESC = 'DEAD', but SSDTC < max DS.DSSTDTC.

rules.description: Raise an error when SSSTRESC = 'DEAD' and SSDTC < max DS.DSSTDTC.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --TPT and --TPTNUM do not have a one-to-one relationship

rules.description: Trigger error when VISITNUM and --TPTREF are not present and --TPT and --TPTNUM does not have a one-to-one relationship

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: RFSTDTC in DM dataset is empty but --STRF is completed.

rules.description: Raise an error when RFSTDTC in DM is empty and --STRF is not empty.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --DIR variable is present, when --LOC variable does not exist in a dataset.

rules.description: Raise an error when --LOC does not exists in a dataset, --DIR exists.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: IDVAR should not be missing when RDOMAIN is not in (empty, DM).

rules.description: IDVAR must be specified.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: ARMCD is not in TA.ARMCD

rules.description: Trigger error when ARMCD is populated and ARMCD is not in TA.ARMCD

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: SESTDTC is required.

rules.description: Raise an error when SESTDTC is null.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: RPPLENDY is present.

rules.description: Raise an error when RPPLENDY is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: PP dataset is present in  study, but PC dataset is not present in study.

rules.description: Raise an error when a PP dataset is present in study, but a PC dataset is not present in study.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --DETECT is present.

rules.description: Raise an error when --DETECT is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: IETESTCD is not unique within TIVERS

rules.description: Trigger error when TIVERS is present and IETESTCD is not unique within TIVERS

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --METHOD is present in an interventions domain.

rules.description: Raise an error when --METHOD is present in an Interventions dataset.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: POOLID must be null when USUBJID is populated

rules.description: Verify that When USUBJID is populated, POOLID is not populated

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: AESTAT variable is present in AE dataset.

rules.description: Raise an error when AESTAT is present in AE dataset.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: TSVAL is null when TSVAL1 is populated.

rules.description: Trigger error when TSVAL1 is populated and TSVAL is null

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: Verify that LBTOXGR value is not from a numeric scale

rules.description: Raise a warning when LBTOXGR is not numeric

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --ENRF is populated when --OCCUR = "N"

rules.description: When --OCCUR = 'N', --ENRF must not be populated

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: IEORRES = N for an exclusion criteria. Only exclusion criteria not met should be included in IE domain.

rules.description: Verify the value for IEORRES is Y

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: DTHFL is not "Y", when SS.SSSTRESC equals "DEAD"

rules.description: Raise an error when DTHFL not equal to "Y" and SS.SSSTRESC = "DEAD".

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --STREFC is null when --ORREF is non-empty or --DRVFL is equal to 'Y'

rules.description: Raise an error when (--ORREF ^= null or --DRVFL='Y') and --STREFC is null.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --TPTREF is not present when --RFTDTC is present in a dataset

rules.description: Raise an error when --TPTREF is not present in dataset when --RFTDTC is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: STRAIN is present in DM dataset.

rules.description: Verify variable STRAIN does not exist in DM dataset

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --TERM is equal to 'MULTIPLE'

rules.description: Raise an error when --TERM = 'MULTIPLE'

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --NOMLBL is present.

rules.description: Raise an error when --NOMLBL is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --STAT is present when --PRESP is not present.

rules.description: Raise an error when --PRESP is not present but --STAT is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: RDOMAIN is not 'DM' but IDVAR is empty.

rules.description: Raise an error when RDOMAIN ^= 'DM' and IDVAR is empty.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --TRT is equal to 'MULTIPLE'

rules.description: Raise an error when --TRT = 'MULTIPLE'

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --TERM is equal to 'OTHER'

rules.description: Raise an error when --TERM = 'OTHER'

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: TRLAT is present.

rules.description: Raise an error when TRLAT is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: Value length of --TEST > 40.

rules.description: Raise an error when length of --TEST > 40.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --RESLOC is present.

rules.description: Raise an error when --RESLOC is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: ARM value in DM dataset is not among the values of ARM variable in TA dataset. This is allowed only in a multistage study with incomplete ARM assignment. Please confirm if your study is a multistage assignment study

rules.description: When study does not use multi-stage arm assignments and ARM is populated, ARM must be present in TA.ARM. This rule has been executed to identify all cases when ARM is not present in TA.ARM and therefore acknowledges that false positives may be recorded when multi-stage arm assignments are in use.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: AESDISAB is completed, but not equal to "N" or "Y"

rules.description: Raise an error when AESDISAB is completed and value is not 'Y' or 'N'

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: DSSTDTC does not equal DM.DTHDTC, when DSDECOD equals "DEATH".

rules.description: Raise an error when DSSTDTC is not equal to DM.DTHDTC and DSDECOD is equal to "DEATH"

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: MHENDTC ^= null and MHENDTC is on or after the DM.RFSTDTC. The medical history dataset should include the subject's prior history at the start of the trial.

rules.description: Raise an issue if MHENDTC has a non-empty date that is on or after DM.RFSTDTC

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: STUDYID is not equal to DM.STUDYID

rules.description: Raise an error when STUDYID is not equal to DM.STUDYID

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: IETEST is not in TI.IETEST

rules.description: Check if IETEST is not in TI.IETEST

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: AEREASND is present.

rules.description: Raise an error when AEREASND is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: RFXSTDTC does not equal the earliest value of EX.EXSTDTC

rules.description: Raise an error when EX records are present for subject but RFXSTDTC does not equal the earliest value of EX.EXSTDTC

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: PESTRESC value is not missing when PEORRES value is missing

rules.description: Verify that PESTRESC is null when PEORRES is null

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --REASND should not be present in dataset when --PRESP is not present in dataset

rules.description: Raise and error when --REASND is present in dataset and --PRESP is not present in dataset

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: Visit Day cannot be found in Trial Visit (TV) domain

rules.description: Verify that visitdy is planned and exists in TV

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: TRLOC is present when TRLOC is not included in the TR domain.

rules.description: Raise an error when TRLOC is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: Scheduled or Contingent visit is not unique within subject

rules.description: When VISITNUM is present in TV.VISITNUM, SV.VISITNUM must be unique within subject

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --NOMDY is present.

rules.description: Raise an error when --NOMDY is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: VISITDY is not null when VISITNUM is not in TV.VISITNUM

rules.description: Trigger error if VISITYDY is populated when VISITNUM is not in TV.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: TSSEQ is not unique within TSPARMCD

rules.description: TSSEQ must be unique within TSPARMCD

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: SUBJID is not unique within study

rules.description: Trigger error if SUBJID is not unique

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: RPHASE is present.

rules.description: Raise an error when RPHASE is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: Variable label length should be less than or equal to 40 characters

rules.description: Raise and error if Variable label length > 40 characters

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: At least one of the Seriousness criteria (AESCAN, AESCONG, AESDISAB, AESDTH, AESHOSP, AESLIFE, AESOD or AESMIE)  = 'Y', but AESER = 'N' or empty.

rules.description: Raise an error when AESCAN, AESCONG, AESDISAB, AESDTH, AESHOSP, AESLIFE, AESOD or AESMIE = 'Y' and AESER = 'N' or is empty.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --ENTPT should be present when --ENRTPT is present in a dataset

rules.description: Raises an error when --ENRTPT is present in dataset but --ENTPT is not present in dataset.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: --TESTCD is equal to 'MULTIPLE'

rules.description: Raise an error when --TESTCD = 'MULTIPLE'

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: RPPLDY is present.

rules.description: Raise an error when RPPLDY is present.

standards.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

params.message: Domain value length is not equal 2.

rules.description: Raise an error when DOMAIN value length is not equal 2.
